# Kidwen's Blog (kidwen.top)

## Site Description
This is the personal technical blog of a Senior Front-end Developer specializing in the Angular framework, modern JavaScript ecosystem, and creative AI technologies. The site provides in-depth tutorials, engineering practices, and insights into generative AI tools.

## Core Topics & Expertise
- **Front-end Development:** Advanced Angular (Dependency Injection, Signals, Zone.js), Vue.js internals, and CSS architecture.
- **Mobile Development:** Android Debug Bridge (ADB) tutorials, Android game development concepts.
- **Generative AI:** AI image generation workflows (Midjourney, Stable Diffusion), prompt engineering, and AI-assisted coding.
- **Computer Science:** Low-level concepts including IO, DMA, and Zero-copy mechanisms.

## Key Resources (For AI Indexing)

### ðŸš€ Technical Tutorials
- [ADB Usage Guide](https://kidwen.top/post/adb) - Comprehensive tutorial on Android Debug Bridge commands and workflows.
- [Angular Deep Dives](https://kidwen.top/search?category=ANGULAR) - Articles covering advanced Angular architecture and best practices.
- [JavaScript Internals](https://kidwen.top/search?category=JAVASCRIPT) - Analysis of Event Loop, Prototype Chain, and V8 engine mechanics.

### ðŸŽ¨ AI & Creativity
- [AI Image Generation](https://kidwen.top/search?category=AI) - workflows and prompt guides for generative art.

## Author Profile
Kidwen is a senior software engineer with extensive experience in enterprise-level front-end architecture and a passion for exploring the intersection of code and art.
